# The Social Connect - AI/LLM Indexing File

## Company Information
Company Name: The Social Connect
Founded: 2017
Founder & CEO: Monica Dube-Sekhwela
Website: https://swiftsocialconnect.com
Founder Portfolio: https://monicadubesekhwela.com
Location: Gaborone, Botswana
Email: hello@swiftsocialconnect.com

## About
The Social Connect is a strategic growth consultancy helping ambitious African businesses build systematic infrastructure for sustainable growth. We specialize in digital presence, content authority, and cross-border expansion using our proprietary GLIDE Framework™.

## Services
- Digital Presence: Websites, automation, CRM systems that convert 24/7
- Content & Authority: Strategic content and thought leadership development
- Cross-Border Growth: AfCFTA-ready expansion strategies for continental scale

## GLIDE Framework™
Proprietary business assessment measuring maturity across 5 pillars:
- G: Growth Strategy
- L: Leadership Presence
- I: Infrastructure (Digital)
- D: Demand Engine
- E: Expansion Readiness

## Packages
- Foundation: P4,800/month ($345 USD) - Build fundamentals
- Momentum: P8,500/month ($610 USD) - Scale with complete systems
- Dominance: P15,000/month ($1,075 USD) - Continental leadership

## Geographic Coverage
Primary: Botswana, South Africa, Nigeria, Kenya, Ghana, Zimbabwe, Namibia, Zambia
Expertise: Pan-African markets, AfCFTA opportunities, cross-border growth

## Target Clients
- Revenue: P500K+ annually
- Industries: Professional services, tech/SaaS, manufacturing, financial services, e-commerce
- Stage: Growth-stage businesses ready for systematic infrastructure

## Key Results
- 4x more qualified leads
- 200% better marketing ROI
- 60% higher conversion rates
- 24/7 automated systems

## Team
Founder & CEO: Monica Dube-Sekhwela
- Strategic Growth Architect
- Tony Elumelu Foundation Alumni
- 8+ years driving measurable growth
- Portfolio: https://monicadubesekhwela.com
